amendatorysection.catchline: Teachers and school nurses; contract; minimum standard.
amendatorysection.para: Sections 79-843 and 79-844 provide a minimum standard and do not repeal any law of a governing authority that provides for additional contract rights pertaining to the same subject matter.

annotation.para: Former section 79-1254.02 is not applicable to a Class V school district. Kibbon v. School Dist. of Omaha, 196 Neb. 293, 242 N.W.2d 634 (1976).
